T02D1781:275a-1: shr'i ya de w'i k'a li s'a dha no pi ka / bod skad du /
T02D1781:275a-2: dpal lha mo nag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1781:275a-3: dpal lha mo nag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1781:275a-4: dpal lha mo sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor bas /
T02D1781:275a-5: yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par bshams la /
T02D1781:275a-6: de nas dur khrod dam shing gcig gi drung ngam /
T02D1781:275a-7: gcong rong ngam khang stong ngam dben pa'i gnas su phyin la /
T02D1781:275a-8: de nas dang po phyogs skyong la sogs pa 'jig
T02D1781:275a-9: rten pa'i lha 'dre thams cad la gtor ma sbyin
T02D1781:275a-10: zhing / gser skyems rgyas par gtong ngo //
T02D1781:275a-11: de nas ae'i mandala kun du khru re la /
T02D1781:275a-12: 'phags su khru gang gi tshang du bya'o //
T02D1781:275a-13: de la stegs bu sum rim du bya'o //
T02D1781:275a-14: bar ma la zla gam gsum du bya'o //
T02D1781:275a-15: tha ma gru gsum du bya'o //
T02D1781:275b-0: tha ma'i gru gsum re re la rabs @275b chad kyi thod pa'am /
T02D1781:275b-1: yang na gang yang rung ba'i thod pa re re bzhag ste /
T02D1781:275b-2: de yang thod pa steng du mngon par byas la /
T02D1781:275b-3: thod pa'i nang du yi ge ya nag po re re ro sol gyis bri'o //
T02D1781:275b-4: thod pa'i phyi la yang yi ge ma dmar po re re khrag gis bri'o //
T02D1781:275b-5: zla gam gsum yang dmar pos byug / gru gsum dmar por tshon btang ste /
T02D1781:275b-6: ma legs na yang 'di lta bu'i skyon yod de
T02D1781:275b-7: tshon sbom na slob dpon dang slob bu la nad
T02D1781:275b-8: mang du yong / tshon phras na slob dpon dang slob bu la nor yal ba 'ong ngo //
T02D1781:275b-9: ya yor gyur na yul du 'khrug pa 'ong ngo //
T02D1781:275b-10: bar chad par gyur na slob dpon slob bu myur du 'chi bar 'gyur /
T02D1781:275b-11: de bas re kh'a smyug ma 'bring po tsam pa byas la /
T02D1781:275b-12: g-yas nas bskor zhing bris te /
T02D1781:275b-13: tshon dgye ba yang gru gsum nyis 'gyur gyi bar du dgye ste /
T02D1781:275b-14: nang gi gru gsum nag por bya /
T02D1781:275b-15: phyi'i gru gsum dmar por bya /
T02D1781:275b-16: nang gi gru gsum gyi rtse mo re re la /
T02D1781:275b-17: rdo rje phyed pa re res mtshan par bri /
T02D1781:275b-18: thal chen dang khrag skam po bsres pas ae'i dbus su sngags kyi sa bon h'um bri /
T02D1781:275b-19: nang gi zur gsum la ma mo thams cad kyi
T02D1781:275b-20: srog gi snying po phul ba bhyo:re re bri bar
T02D1781:275b-21: bya'o // de nas da du ra'i khu ba dang ra rog po'i khrag dang /
T02D1781:275b-22: bya mo nag mo'i khrag dang /
T02D1781:275b-23: de dag cha bsnyams nas bsres la zhib tu btags la tshon rtsi dang sbyar nas /
T02D1781:275b-24: dur khrod kyi ras la dpal lha mo'i sku bris la /
T02D1781:275b-25: ae'i mandala gyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D1781:275b-26: der yang spos la sog pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad lnga tshang bar bsags la mchod pa 'bul te /
T02D1781:275b-27: de yang bdag dam tshig gi lha mor bsgoms te /
T02D1781:275b-28: dang por rnal 'byor pa'i snying ga'i dbus su padma bzhi pa'am /
T02D1781:275b-29: yang na padma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa zhig bsam /
T02D1781:275b-30: padma de'i snying po'i dbus su yi ge aom klad
T02D1781:275b-31: kor dang bcas pa las 'od 'bar ba cig bsam
T02D1781:275b-32: mo // de'i steng du yi ge ram ram gyi
T02D1781:275b-33: gzi brjid kyis ram nyid me ltar 'bar ba cig
T02D1781:275b-34: mo // bsam / me nges bdag gi rnam par
T02D1781:275b-35: rtog pa can gyi lus bsregs nas thal bar gyur
T02D1781:275b-36: mo // bsam / bar bsam mo // de nas
T02D1781:275b-37: yang thal ba de'i dbus su zhi ba'i yid kyis
T02D1781:276a-0: sngon gyi padma'i snying po la gnas pa srog gi rang @276a * //
T02D1781:276a-2: de'i steng du yi ge bam bsam mo //
T02D1781:276a-3: de nas bam de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1781:276a-4: bum pa dkar po kha nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa cig bsam /
T02D1781:276a-5: de nas sngon gyi srog tu bshad pa'i yi ge
T02D1781:276a-6: aam de las bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bab cing sbrengs
T02D1781:276a-7: pas yi ge kun gyi mchog tu bshad pa'i aam
T02D1781:276a-8: zhes pa chu des lhag par yang brtan zhing brtag
T02D1781:276a-9: par byas nas gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur nas
T02D1781:276a-10: / zla ba dang kha ba dang 'o ma dang /
T02D1781:276a-11: kunda dang sprin dkar po dang dung lta bur bsams te /
T02D1781:276a-12: de nas dpal lha mo'i mtshan gyi sngags /
T02D1781:276a-13: aom ma h'a k'a li de w'i k'a r'a li /
T02D1781:276a-16: tsanda r'u pi ni h'um phat /
T02D1781:276a-18: sngags kyi sa bon aom de las sa bon lhar bsgrubs te /
T02D1781:276a-19: dpal lha mo chen mo'i skur bsgyur zhing bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02D1781:276a-20: sku mdog nag mo nag po srin dang bung ba lta bur gnag pa /
T02D1781:276a-25: g-yas kyi dang po na ral gri /
T02D1781:276a-26: 'og ma na bhandha dmar gyis bskyil ba /
T02D1781:276a-28: g-yon gyi dang po'i phyag na shakti /
T02D1781:276a-29: 'og ma na tri sh'u la'i mgul du dar dpyangs phyar ba thogs pa /
T02D1781:276a-30: mi ro rengs pa khar bcug nas mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa /
T02D1781:276a-31: spyan gsum dmar po bzlog nas blta ba /
T02D1781:276a-32: dbu skra ral pa gyen du brjes shing len bu g-yon du 'khyil ba /
T02D1781:276a-33: dbu skra la sbrul dang thod phreng gis brgyan pa /
T02D1781:276a-34: snyan cha g-yas na sprul gyi mgul na dril bu gsil ba /
T02D1781:276a-35: snyan cha g-yon pa na seng ge'i ral pa dmar ba /
T02D1781:276a-36: rna ltag gnyis na me tog dang dar dmar po'i cod pan 'phur pa /
T02D1781:276a-37: lha ma yin la sogs pa'i thod pas do shal du byas pa /
T02D1781:276a-38: glang po che'i ko rlon gyis stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02D1781:276a-39: ba lang ge ko rlon chan pas dras pa la /
T02D1781:276a-40: re lnge [*lde?] ser pos sham bur btags pas sku smad dkris pa /
T02D1781:276a-41: khrag dang zhag gi thig les bris pa /
T02D1781:276a-42: klu'i rgyal po gshibs pas ska rags byas pa /
T02D1781:276a-43: zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog gis brgyan pa /
T02D1781:276a-44: bong bu gva pa'i steng na rtsen skyil du bzhugs pa /
T02D1781:276a-45: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na skang dung dang 'brug gi sgra lta bu sgrogs shing /
T02D1781:276b-0: sha za thams cad dbang du sdud pa cig @276b tu bsgom mo //
T02D1781:276b-1: de ltar gsal ba de'i thugs ka'i dbus su /
T02D1781:276b-2: thugs me'am me stag 'dra ba la /
T02D1781:276b-3: rang gi sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du /
T02D1781:276b-4: dbyibs sgo nga'i gzugs dang 'dra ba cig gsal bar bsgom mo //
T02D1781:276b-5: sgo nga de'i dbus su h'um nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa cig bsgom mo //
T02D1781:276b-6: de yang h'um gi thig le ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam /
T02D1781:276b-7: h'um gi zla tshes ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam mo //
T02D1781:276b-8: de'i 'og tu h'um de las 'od zer byung bas /
T02D1781:276b-9: bzlas pa'i yig 'bru rnams kyi phreng bar gyur par bsam /
T02D1781:276b-10: h'um de nyid mtha' ma bskor bar bsgom shing /
T02D1781:276b-11: h'um de nyid la blta zhing gsal ba dang /
T02D1781:276b-12: 'dris shing goms pa'i sbyor bas rtse gsum pa kho na bsgom mo //
T02D1781:276b-13: de ltar bdag dam tshig gi lha mor gsal ba dang /
T02D1781:276b-14: grub pa'i gnas nas rang bzhin gyi lha mo sngon
T02D1781:276b-15: gyi dang 'dra ba zhig /'khor nag mo gcer bu
T02D1781:276b-16: ral pa can / thod pa se ral khar brgyan pa /
T02D1781:276b-17: lag pa g-yas pa na mi'i snying thogs pa /
T02D1781:276b-18: lag pa g-yon pa na bhandha raktas bkang ba 'dzin pa /
T02D1781:276b-19: snying gi dbus na srog gi snying po yi ge
T02D1781:276b-20: bhyo: re re yod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T02D1781:276b-21: dang bcas te byon par bsam mo //
T02D1781:276b-22: de ltar nam mkha' la spyan drangs nas /
T02D1781:276b-23: mdun gyi ae'i dbus su sngags kyi sa bon h'um
T02D1781:276b-24: dang bhyo: la so sor thim pas sku phyag rgyar
T02D1781:276b-25: zhes pas bya'o // de yang dgug pa dang /
T02D1781:276b-26: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba'i sngags 'dis bya'o //
T02D1781:276b-27: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D1781:276b-29: sa ma ya ho: zhes brjod nas /
T02D1781:276b-30: de nas gzugs dngos su ston cig par bsgom mo //
T02D1781:276b-31: de ltar mi ston na aom h'um bhyo: //
T02D1781:276b-32: ae aa ralli hr'i: dza: zhes sngags de brjod cing gzir ro //
T02D1781:276b-33: mngon sum du ma byung na yang nga'i sems la
T02D1781:276b-34: ci 'dod pa de ni khyod kyis grub par gyis
T02D1781:276b-35: shig par bsgo'o // de nas kyang sngags kyi las byed pa'i tshe rigs kyi dam tshig byin te /
T02D1781:276b-36: dam tshig kyang gur gum gyi chu la sngags kyis btab la sbyin no //
T02D1781:276b-38: aom ha na ha na badzra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma nan h'um phat /
T02D1781:276b-39: dam tshig gi chu byin nas bsgo ba /
T02D1781:276b-40: lha mo khyod dam tshig 'di las 'das na /
T02D1781:276b-41: bsgo ba bzhin du ma nyan gyi bar du gzir ba chen por byed pa dang /
T02D1781:277a-0: dam tshig gi chu 'di yang dug ha la ha la @277a * //
T02D1781:277a-2: mthong bas khrag tu skyug pa dang /
T02D1781:277a-3: rdo rje za byed chen pos snying drangs te dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1781:277a-4: gnod sbyin gyis gsod par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1781:277a-5: 'gas pa dang khro bo za byed chen po dang 'jigs byed chen por 'gyur te /
T02D1781:277a-6: dpal chen po'i rdo rje chen pos snying dral te /
T02D1781:277a-7: me dpal rdo rje 'bar bas tshig nas lus thal bar byas te /
T02D1781:277a-8: so so rang rang gi gnas bor ba bzhin du
T02D1781:277a-9: dmyal ba 'bod 'grogs su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1781:277a-11: de nas dpal lha mo la mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma dbul te /
T02D1781:277a-12: aom h'um shri ye de w'i k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo //
T02D1781:277a-13: aom badzra pushpe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um phat /
T02D1781:277a-14: ces brjod de me tog dbul lo //
T02D1781:277a-15: aom badzra dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um phat /
T02D1781:277a-16: ces brjod de bdug spos shangs la dbul lo //
T02D1781:277a-17: aom badzra 'di pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um phat /
T02D1781:277a-18: ces mar me spyan la dbul lo //
T02D1781:277a-19: aom badzra ghandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um phat /
T02D1781:277a-20: ces dri chab thugs kar dbul lo //
T02D1781:277a-21: aom badzra nee bi dya p'u dza me gha sa
T02D1781:277a-22: mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um phat
T02D1781:277a-23: / ces brjod de lha bshos phyag tu dbul lo //
T02D1781:277a-24: de nas ra rog po'i sha khrag dang /
T02D1781:277a-25: bya mo nag mo'i sha khrag dang /
T02D1781:277a-26: gzhan gyi yang khrag sna tshogs gang 'byor dang sha
T02D1781:277a-27: chad la sogs pa bza' ba sna tshogs dang ldan
T02D1781:277a-28: pa'i gtor ma dbul bar byas te /
T02D1781:277a-29: ma h'a mam sa kh'a hi /
T02D1781:277a-30: ma h'a go ro tsa na kh'a hi /
T02D1781:277a-31: ma h'a ba su ta kh'a hi /
T02D1781:277a-32: ai dam ba lim grihna grihna pa ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1781:277a-33: zhes brjod de gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1781:277a-34: de nas mchod pa rtogs par phul nas /
T02D1781:277a-35: bstod de gling bu'am mi rkang 'bud /
T02D1781:277a-36: cang te'u 'am mi thod kyi rnga brdung zhing dbyangs snyan pas bstod par bya ste /
T02D1781:277a-37: aom dpal ldan lha mo mi pham srid gsum bdag
T02D1781:277a-38: / rang don bsgrub phyir rnam thar la gzhol kyang
T02D1781:277a-39: // snying rje'i dbang gis rjes la thob pa yi //
T02D1781:277a-40: shes rab sna tshogs dag gis 'gro don byed //
T02D1781:277a-41: lha mo sku mdog nag mo char sprin mdog / mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs //
T02D1781:277a-42: shin tu sgeg cing keng rus lus can ma //
T02D1781:277a-43: zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i sku //
T02D1781:277a-44: ral pa gyen 'greng lan bu g-yon du 'khyil //
T02D1781:277a-45: skra rked sprul la thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1781:277b-0: rna ltag me tog dar na gcod @277b pan can //
T02D1781:277b-1: khrag gi chang gis ra ro spyan rtsa dmar //
T02D1781:277b-2: mi ro red pa khar bcug mche ba bzhi //
T02D1781:277b-3: rnam par gtsigs nas khrag la shin tu dgyes //
T02D1781:277b-4: snyan g-yas sprul gyi mgul nas dril gsil zhing //
T02D1781:277b-5: gdug pa btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma //
T02D1781:277b-6: snyan cha g-yon pa seng ge'i ral pa dmar //
T02D1781:277b-7: dpa' bo khams gsum seng ge'i sgra sgrogs ma //
T02D1781:277b-8: phyag bzhi g-yas kyi dang pos ral gri 'dzin //
T02D1781:277b-10: g-yon gyi dang pos shakta'i mtshon cha 'dzin //
T02D1781:277b-11: 'og ma tri sh'u'i mgul na dar dpyangs 'phyar //
T02D1781:277b-12: shakti ral gris mtshon gyis bsad pa yi //
T02D1781:277b-13: lha ma yin gyi thod pas do shal byas //
T02D1781:277b-14: glang po che yi ko rlon stod g-yogs 'dzin //
T02D1781:277b-15: smad ni ba lang ko rlon dras pa la //
T02D1781:277b-16: phyed ni re lnge [*lde?] ser po sham bur dkris //
T02D1781:277b-17: klu yi dbang po gshibs pa'i rked bcings can //
T02D1781:277b-18: zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog dag gis mdzes par brgyan //
T02D1781:277b-19: khrag zhag dmar po'i tshom bus thig ler bris //
T02D1781:277b-20: bong bu gva zhon mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu //
T02D1781:277b-21: bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs can ma //
T02D1781:277b-22: khams gsum skad cig dag gis skor bar byed //
T02D1781:277b-23: skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus //
T02D1781:277b-24: ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du sdud //
T02D1781:277b-25: lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang rtag tu gnas //
T02D1781:277b-26: dam pa'i sa nas gzugs sku gnyis gzigs ma //
T02D1781:277b-27: ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su byon //
T02D1781:277b-28: tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma //
T02D1781:277b-29: gzhan la dbang sgyur 'dod khams sa mthar phyin //
T02D1781:277b-30: dbang phyug chen po'i sku la dgyes 'khril ma //
T02D1781:277b-31: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas bzhir byon pa'i tshe //
T02D1781:277b-32: lha rnams dbang phyug brgya byin phyag byas ma //
T02D1781:277b-33: lha ma yin rnams phung bar byas pa'i tshe //
T02D1781:277b-34: lha min dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma //
T02D1781:277b-35: sku mchog ri rab che dang bsgril ba'i tshe //
T02D1781:277b-36: lte ba'i thad kyi phyogs nas nyi zla 'char //
T02D1781:277b-37: rgyal chen bzhi la sogs pas phyag byas ma //
T02D1781:277b-38: rgya mtsho'i gting nas me 'bar mtsho skems nus //
T02D1781:277b-39: sa 'og dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma //
T02D1781:277b-40: lha mo khyod kyis cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas //
T02D1781:277b-41: bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po 'dar zhing 'dud //
T02D1781:277b-42: ma mo srin mo'i tshogs rnams rngam zhing dgod //
T02D1781:278a-2: nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa'i 'od zer 'bar //
T02D1781:278a-3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag gi bcud bsdus nas //
T02D1781:278a-4: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim par mdzad //
T02D1781:278a-5: dug gi rlangs pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyis //
T02D1781:278a-6: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams slong byed ma //
T02D1781:278a-7: de'i phyir nad kyi bdag mo dam la 'du //
T02D1781:278a-8: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcung [*bcud] bsdus nas //
T02D1781:278a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim par mdzad //
T02D1781:278a-10: bdud rtsi'i rlangs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyi //
T02D1781:278a-11: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad ni rtsad gcod ma //
T02D1781:278a-12: bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal mo dmal 'du //
T02D1781:278a-13: gang zhig khyod la dad na ma bas byams //
T02D1781:278a-14: de phyir ma gcig nad bdag sman gyi gtso //
T02D1781:278a-15: lha mo khyod la bdag gis rtag tu bstod //
T02D1781:278a-16: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i spyan snga ru //
T02D1781:278a-17: bdag gis 'di nas 'khor ba ji srid bar //
T02D1781:278a-18: dkar po'i phyogs kyi nad dang sdug bsngal sogs //
T02D1781:278a-19: zhi bar bya phyir tshe dang longs spyod spel //
T02D1781:278a-20: nag po'i phyogs ni dgug cing dbang du bsdu //
T02D1781:278a-21: smyo 'bog gsad la sogs pa'i las 'di dag / bstan pa bsrung phyir las 'di grub par bgyi //
T02D1781:278a-22: 'di las 'gal na rgyal ba'i bka' bslus pas //
T02D1781:278a-23: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rjes mgo 'gems shog / de skad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa //
T02D1781:278a-24: dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du mdzod //
T02D1781:278a-25: rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor rnams la //
T02D1781:278a-26: zhal nas bdud rtsi char pa'i rgyun phob la //
T02D1781:278a-27: nad sogs sdug bsngal tshogs ni zhi bar mdzod //
T02D1781:278a-28: tshe dang dbang dang longs spyod rgyas par mdzod //
T02D1781:278a-29: zang zing lo thog 'bru yi phung po dang //
T02D1781:278a-30: rin chen rkang 'gro'i phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod //
T02D1781:278a-31: bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod //
T02D1781:278a-32: bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i dgra //
T02D1781:278a-33: che ge mo zhes bya ba'i las ngan 'di//
T02D1781:278a-34: khyod kyi khong nas dug gi rlung bus la //
T02D1781:278a-35: 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad rnams khong nas slong //
T02D1781:278a-36: bag bzhi sa la lhung nas brdebs su chug /
T02D1781:278a-37: don snying smad lnga'i khong khrag skyug tu chug /
T02D1781:278a-38: las ngan 'khor bcas brang chen brdung du chug /
T02D1781:278b-0: smre sngags tshe de gnam du 'bod du chug @278b
T02D1781:278b-1: 'chi ba'i dug mda' smyo 'bog gsad par mdzod //
T02D1781:278b-2: gcan gzan mkha' lding la sogs ltas ngan phob //
T02D1781:278b-3: bstan pa bsrung ba'i las 'di myur du mdzod //
T02D1781:278b-4: aom ru ru ro ru bi ti shtha ba dhot+si /
T02D1781:278b-5: k'a ma la r'ak+kha s'i h'um bhyo:/
T02D1781:278b-6: che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D1781:278b-10: brgya rtsa brgyad dam yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D1781:278b-11: bzlas la gzhan yang lha mo'i gzungs la sogs pas
T02D1781:278b-13: de nas lha mo'i sbyor ba la gnas nas /
T02D1781:278b-14: thams cad don ni grub byed pa'i //
T02D1781:278b-15: snying po yi ni gsang sngags 'di //
T02D1781:278b-16: rtag par bzlas pa byas pa ste //
T02D1781:278b-17: myur ba yang ni ma yin pa /
T02D1781:278b-18: 'thogs pa yang ni ma yin pa /
T02D1781:278b-19: mi gsal ba yang ma yin pa /
T02D1781:278b-20: gug skyed nyams pa ma yin par /
T02D1781:278b-21: g-yeng ba'i rtog pha spangs la bzlas pa'o //
T02D1781:278b-22: aom h'um shr'i ya de w'i k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo:/
T02D1781:278b-23: aom aa ra lli hrim dza: zhes yig 'bru gsal bar lha mos bzlas te /
T02D1781:278b-24: sngags kyi bzlas pa thams cad kyang lha mo'i tshig yin par che ba'i nga rgyal bya zhing /
T02D1781:278b-25: rang gi sprul pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra byung bar bsam zhing /
T02D1781:278b-26: bzlas pa brtson par byas pas de lta bu thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1781:278b-27: des ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i sngags te /
T02D1781:278b-29: yang na 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa'am /
T02D1781:278b-30: yang na 'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas las thams cad 'grub po //
T02D1781:278b-31: de yang na sngags khri phrag re re bzlas nas gtor ma re re gtang ste /
T02D1781:278b-32: khu tshur bcangs mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la /
T02D1781:278b-33: kha 'gram g-yas g-yon du mche ba ltar byas la /
T02D1781:278b-34: aom bhya ba ba ta li ba ta li tshe //
T02D1781:278b-35: zhes lan bdun nam gsum bzlas nas /
T02D1781:278b-37: dur khrod bdag mo dngos grub zhal //
T02D1781:278b-38: gtum mo 'jigs byed yi dags kha //
T02D1781:278b-39: dam tshig srung ma khrag dga' mo //
T02D1781:278b-40: ki li sgra sgrogs sbyor zin mo //
T02D1781:278b-41: dur khrod ro yi tshal dbus na //
T02D1781:278b-42: tshogs dang pho nyar bcas pa ru //
T02D1781:278b-43: gtsigs byed gtum mo dud sol ma //
T02D1781:278b-44: gsol cig bzhes zhig dam tshig lha //
T02D1781:278b-45: gnas nas gnas su mdzad du gsol //
T02D1781:278b-46: bdag gi sems la ci 'dod pa //
T02D1781:278b-47: de ni khyod kyis grub par mdzad //
T02D1781:279a-2: de la kun gyis grogs gyis shig / h'um grihna grihnan sarba dusht'am /
T02D1781:279a-4: phrom phrom phrom phat sv'a h'a zhes brjod de /
T02D1781:279a-5: se gol lan gsum gdab ste gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1781:279a-6: 'dzab ma rdzogs kyi bar du rgyun de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1781:279a-7: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du de ltar bzlas la /
T02D1781:279a-8: skyo bar gyur na yang bstod pa byas la mchod pa phul nas /
T02D1781:279a-9: phyag byas te lha mo slar gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1781:279a-10: dpal lha mo nag mo la sngon du mchod pa chen po dbul zhing /
T02D1781:279a-11: bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas la /
T02D1781:279a-12: lha mos lung bstan cing mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang /
T02D1781:279a-13: dang po nyid du snying po'i sngags la 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas la /
T02D1781:279a-14: de nas bstod cing las la sbyar ro //
T02D1781:279a-15: de nas smyo zhing gsad pa'i las bya na /
T02D1781:279a-19: dur khrod kyi thal ba dron mo dang /
T02D1781:279a-20: dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D1781:279a-21: rdzas de dag gcig tu bsres te zhib tu btags la /
T02D1781:279a-22: bong bu'i gcin gyis sprus te bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bya'o //
T02D1781:279a-24: ldum bu med na lung thang tse'i 'bras bu dang
T02D1781:279a-25: dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshv'a ra khrag dang
T02D1781:279a-26: sbyar bas / mi de'i ming rus rigs kyi bla
T02D1781:279a-27: gang yin pa'i bla gzugs gro ga la bris la
T02D1781:279a-28: sbyar bas / / bla de'i lus la dgra bo
T02D1781:279a-29: de'i ming rus sod cig pa'i bskul tshig dang bcas
T02D1781:279a-30: sbyar bas / / pa bris te / 'di skad du h'um che ge mo m'a ra ya phat /
T02D1781:279a-32: ces bris la bla rdo dang sbrags la gzugs brnyan
T02D1781:279a-33: gyi snying gar gzhug / gzhan yang gong gi rdzas
T02D1781:279a-34: dang tsha ba gsum mu zi nag po rnams bsres
T02D1781:279a-35: te / zhib par btags te bong bu'i gcin dang sbyar te /
T02D1781:279a-36: gzugs brnyan gyi kun du khyab par bsku'o /
T02D1781:279a-37: de nas gcan gzan gyi thod pa'i kha nang du bcug la ;
T02D1781:279a-38: / mandala gyi dbus su gzhag / de nas gang
T02D1781:279a-39: la bya ba de bkug cing gzugs brnyan la bstim
T02D1781:279a-40: / de yin pa kho nar bsams la de la las bya'o //
T02D1781:279a-41: rgya gar phan chod na mi gsod pa'i gsal shing rtse gcig pa byed pas /
T02D1781:279b-0: 'dir yang lcags las gsal shing rtse gcig pa brdungs @279b la bya'o //
T02D1781:279b-1: byas pas ni lha mo yin te /
T02D1781:279b-2: gzugs brnyan gyi rkub nas gyen du btsugs te khar phyung la gzugs so //
T02D1781:279b-3: de nas sngags 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na dgra bo brlag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1781:279b-4: de'i dus su bsam par bya ba ni bsgrub bya
T02D1781:279b-5: de'i snying ga'i dbus kyi yi ge kam las gyur
T02D1781:279b-6: pa'i sdig pa kha dog nag po mi sdug pa
T02D1781:279b-7: zhig gis / snying gi mar me'i dbus nas snying khrag 'thung zhing sha za bar bsam mo //
T02D1781:279b-8: gzhan yang bdag dpal lha mo bsgoms pa'i snying ga'i
T02D1781:279b-9: mar me'i nang gi h'um gi 'od zer las dza:
T02D1781:279b-10: dmar po bsgril ma phyogs bcur 'phros 'dus pa las
T02D1781:279b-11: / de yongs su gyur pa las lcags kyi spyang mo ral pa can cig tu bsgom /
T02D1781:279b-12: des bsgrub bya'i snying rtsa dbu mar thon nas khrag 'thung bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas te /
T02D1781:279b-13: aom h'um shri ye de w'i k'a li k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo: //
T02D1781:279b-14: m'a ma sha tr'um aa mu ka m'a ra ya m'a ra ya h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1781:279b-16: rdzas ni ka na ka'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D1781:279b-23: lan tshv'a bsregs pa'i phye ma de rnams zhib tu
T02D1781:279b-24: btags pa'i phye ma'i sbyor ba byas pa la bsngags
T02D1781:279b-26: phur bu rdo rje drag po dmar lhag ge bsregs la snying gar gdab /
T02D1781:279b-27: de nas gzugs brnyan mtshon rnon pos gtubs la phye ma byas la /
T02D1781:279b-28: smyo shing gi 'bras bu yod na rab /
T02D1781:279b-29: med na lang tang tse'i 'bras bu brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D1781:279b-30: rtsab mo'i nang du btags nas gzugs brnyan gyi phye
T02D1781:279b-32: dpal lha mo'i sbyor bas skra bshig gcer bur phud nas /
T02D1781:279b-33: kha lho phyogs su bltas nas tsher ma'i me la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1781:279b-35: aom h'um shri ye de w'i k'a li k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo //
T02D1781:279b-36: ma ma sha tr'um aa mu kam m'a ra ya phat /
T02D1781:279b-38: ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D1781:279b-39: rdzas dang bstun zhing brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1781:279b-40: de ltar byas na smyo bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1781:279b-41: aam gi thal ba de nyid blangs te /
T02D1781:279b-42: de nyid kyi spyi bor btab na lo nyi shu
T02D1781:279b-43: rtsa gcig tu smyo bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad
T02D1781:280a-2: bu mo nag mo khros pa yang //
T02D1781:280a-3: gang zhig 'ching bas bcings gyur na //
T02D1781:280a-4: mtshan mo nag mo der shes bya //
T02D1781:280a-5: bsgrub bya nyi ma bdun na ni //
T02D1781:280a-7: gal te cung zad 'gor na yang //
T02D1781:280a-8: nyin zhag bdun du bsam gtan 'di bya'o //
T02D1781:280a-9: bsgrub bya'i lus po skams pa rid pa /
T02D1781:280a-10: mdog nyams pa dri ma can /
T02D1781:280a-12: khu ba rdul dang khrag 'dzag pa /
T02D1781:280a-13: 'dar ba'i cha byad can zhig tu bsam /
T02D1781:280a-14: yang na mngon sum du bsams te /
T02D1781:280a-15: bdag lha mor gnas pa'i snying ga'i h'um las 'od
T02D1781:280a-16: zer nyi ma'i zer dang me stag lta bu las
T02D1781:280a-17: / bskal pa'i me bzhin du 'bar zhing 'ur sgra dang tog tog dang /
T02D1781:280a-18: chem chem can du drag po'i yi ge h'um du gyur te /
T02D1781:280a-19: h'um de las rdo rje 'bar ba'i khab tu gyur par bsam /
T02D1781:280a-20: rdo rje 'bar ba'i khab de dgra bo'i gzhang kha'i sgor zhugs te /
T02D1781:280a-21: snying phug nas kha'i nang ngam spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gar phyung nas cher 'bar bar bsams te /
T02D1781:280a-22: snying po'i sngags kyi mjug la /
T02D1781:280a-23: cha ge mo ha na ha na /
T02D1781:280a-25: h'um h'um phat phat kyi sngags kyis kha sbub tu lhung bar bsam mo //
T02D1781:280a-26: de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyis /
T02D1781:280a-28: 'on kyang 'khor ba na gnas pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D1781:280a-29: mkha' 'gro ma dud sol gyi sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen po n'a ro pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
